summary: TAKATA RECALL: I WAS NOTIFIED OF THIS RECALL REGARDING MY DRIVER SIDE AIRBAG ALMOST A YEAR AGO WITH NO CONTACT OR REMEDY SINCE. MERCEDES HAS ALSO REFUSED TO PROVIDE ALTERNATE TRANSPORTATION AT THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER LEVEL, SAYING NO ONE HAS BEEN INJURED YET. I FEEL MERCEDES SHOULD TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE SAFETY OF ITS CUSTOMER AND PROVIDE LOANER VEHICLES WHILE WE WAIT FOR REPLACEMENT AIRBAGS. I DON'T FEEL MY LIFE SHOULD BE PUT AT RISK FOR THIS ISSUE.
